(5607x243+251)/64 mod 128 = 45. (5607x729+817)/128 mod 64 = 4. (5607x729+817)/256 mod 32 = 2. (5607x729+817)/512 mod 16 = 1. (5607x2187+2963)/1024 mod 8 = 2. (5607x2187+2963)/2048 mod 4 = 1. (5607x6561+10937)/4096 mod 2 = 0. (5607x6561+10937)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
